name: Hoyle Casino Empire
description:
In HOYLE Casino Empire, the goal is to build and run your very own casino and bring in the big spenders! Rule your empire as a straight-shooting business man or a double-dealin' scoundrel in your neon-soaked desert playground. Utilize your ties to the Mob or prove you can make your fortune without their underhanded tactics. Loosen the slots, add decor for ambiance, and bring in the Vegas showbiz glitz to attract everyone from the wannabe swingers to the high rollers. Just remember you’re not the only game in town

Build and run your very own casino, complete with bright lights, free booze, and wallet-sucking slots. Pack a full house by catering to the high rollers with the fat bankrolls, or concentrate on the hordes of desperate desert tourists. Now you call the shots on who goes, who stays, and who helps you build your Vegas empire.

Features
Build 8 authentic casinos

Select your casino theme and play against the challenges and pitfalls that come with building the hottest joint on the Strip. Choose from Egyptian to Rock & Roll themes, and everything in between!
Play in actual tournaments

Boost your bank and your ego at the same time. Pull up a seat at a blackjack table in your own casino and take on the clientele in a high-stakes game.
Take on rival casinos

Lure gamblers away with your competitive tools of the trade. Have thugs break their bank, or send in entertainers with flyers to capture their family-oriented customers.
Run behind-the-scenes operations

Set the stakes and the salaries to maximize your profits.
